text: Storm The Studio RMXS is a remix album of the 1989 Meat Beat Manifesto album Storm The Studio. ==Track listing== #"Cease to Exist (M.B.M. vs. D.H.S. Mix)" - 6:11 #*Remix by: DHS #"God O.D. (Eight Ways to O.D. on God Mix)" - 5:11 #*Remix by: Eight Frozen Modules #"Storm the Dub Mix" - 4:49 #*Remix by: Twilight Circus Dub Sound System #"Shadow & Substance Mix" - 5:43 #*Remix by: DJ Spooky That Subliminal Kid #"God O.D. (Jonah Sharp Mix)" - 5:57 #*Remix by: Jonah Sharp #"God O.D. (Bud O.D. So U Can't C Mix)" - 4:59 #*Remix by: The Mellowtrons #"STS 2006 (Antipopulist Mix)" - 3:15 #*Remix by: High Priest #"I Got the Fear (The Opus Mix)" - 5:36 #*Remix by: The Opus #"Re-Animix (Komet Mix)" - 6:02 #*Remix by: Frank Bretschneider #"God O.D. - Part 2 (Merzbow Mix)" - 8:23 #*Remix by: Merzbow #"Storm the Studio (D.J. Swamp Mix)" - 5:02 #*Remix by: DJ Swamp #"God O.D. - Part 1 (Lok-Lak Mix)" - 5:02 #*Remix by: Norscq #"M.B.M. Re-Animator (Scanner: Kindle And Solace Mix)" - 6:35 #*Remix by: Scanner ==References== Category:Meat Beat Manifesto albums Category:2003 remix albums Category:Industrial remix albums
title: Storm the Studio RMXS
